amendment.description: To require that legislation to reauthorize SCHIP include provisions codifying the unborn child regulation.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4233 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 52. Record Vote Number: 81.

action.text: Amendment SA 4233 proposed by Senator Allard. (consideration: CR S2083; text: CR S2083) To require that legislation to reauthorize SCHIP include provisions codifying the unborn child regulation.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 4233 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 52. Record Vote Number: 81.
